column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////WOW! Absolutely blown away! Celebrated my 30th birthday here and it was one of the best meals we have EVER had in Chicago- maybe truly the best! Service was impeccable
column2: ambiance and decor was incredibly cozy and detailed (as all Hogsalt restaurants are). The sourdough and butter house bread was one of the best pieces of sourdough I've ever had- so warm and fresh with the best crust. We started with the crab stuffed avocado salad and crab cake. The salad was delicious and refreshing. The crab cake at $30 is pretty high
column5: so definitely worth the price! The steak was cooked to perfection. My husband thinks it was the best steak he has ever had. The fried chicken was impossibly crispy
column6: the mashed potatoes and gravy with it were creamy
column8: absolutely divine. The sundae speaks for itself- such a fun dessert! I can't thank Bavette's enough for one of the best dining experience we have ever had! Set a reminder on your phone for 30 days before your desired date to make a reservation- otherwise it's hard to get in
column9: and we understand why. Thank you again!
